org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.sql.meta.provider.text

Class BeamTextCSVTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.sql.impl.schema.BaseBeamTable
      • org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.sql.meta.provider.text.BeamTextTable
        • org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.sql.meta.provider.text.BeamTextCSVTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, BeamSqlTable

    public class BeamTextCSVTable
extends BeamTextTable
    BeamTextCSVTable is a BeamTextTable which formatted in CSV.

    CSVFormat itself has many dialects, check its javadoc for more info.

    See Also:
